name: Coded Frog
description:
Coded frog is a 2d puzzle game made for the mini jam 106. The theme was Frogs and the limitation was Limited time.

The goal is to move the frog and make it eat all the flies of the level.

To move the frog you will need to program him with the bests statements within a limited time. The timer only go down when you program.

Estimated worked time: 20 hours.

I did everything except:

  • Music: Nanos
  • Frog sprites and animations: SeethingSwarm's Frog Pack (https://seethingswarm.itch.io/frogpack)

Disclaimer: as it was for a game jam it is missing a lot of mechanics and levels.
